This app has fatal bugs. I ordered online via this app and also paid online. Unfortunately i havenot received any pizza even almost 2 days gone! Fortunately i took screenshot of my order. You will not be able to see your ongoing order or order status in this app. After making contact with their outlet, they helped me. So, Be careful. Don't pay online via this app. Always order cash on delivery.
